item.title: Automated pipeline tests, version bumping and deployments with Gitlab
item.description: This is one of my favorite topics! Setting up a fully automated deployment. I want to share with you how to set up a fully automated deployment including tests and version bumping. I am using PHP and Laravel as the sample project but please keep in mind that this post is not limited to Laravel and PHP only! If you donâ€™t want to read the post and jump to the Repo:
